dupl module¶

Created on Dez 01, 2015

author:Janos Borst

This is a Module to calulate the Similarity of Documents.

dupl.grab_duplicates(input_file, output_file)¶

Iterate over the given database and write all the duplicates to an output database with the respective score

Parameters:
  • input_file – Input database
  • output_file – Output database
dupl.main()¶

Short Main function to hand over the commandline Arguments to grap duplicates

dupl.new_database(output_file)¶

Create a New Database suited for the Duplicates. Columns: ID1, ID2, percentage1, percentage2

Parameters:output_file – Name of the sqlite3 database file that will be created
dupl.similarityof(document_1, document_2)¶

Calculation the percentage of mutually contained words.

Parameters:
  • document_1 – Document 1
  • document_2 – Document to compare with.
Returns:

Percentage of words from 1 that are contained in 2, Percentage of words from 2 contained in 1
Return type:

float,float
dupl.writeToDatabase(input_file, output_file)¶
